description: Try our easy to follow Christmas Trifle recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Christmas Trifle Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 170g natural orange & mango flavoured jelly crystals (2 x 85g pkts)
1 cup raspberry jam (or red currant jelly)

recipeInstructions.text: Empty 1 packet orange and mango jelly crystals into a bowl. Add 1 1/2 cups boiling water and stir well to dissolve. Stir in 1 cup cold water, then pour into a 10-cup capacity trifle bowl. Cool, then refrigerate for about 45 minutes or until jelly is partially set; the consistency will be like egg white.
Meanwhile, prepare remaining jelly crystals, in separate bowls, as per packet directions. Cool, then pour each into separate 28x18cm baking pans. Refrigerate until set.
Cut 2 peaches and 2 plums into wedges. Gently press fruit wedges into partially set jelly in the trifle bowl. Refrigerate overnight until completely set.
The next day, cut 1 sponge cake into squares and arrange over set jelly and fruit in trifle bowl. Spoon custard over the sponge.

Cut set jellies in pans into cubes and remaining fruit into wedges. Arrange jelly cubes and fruit wedges, reserving some for the top, over custard. Whip cream until soft peaks form. Spoon over trifle and top with reserved jelly and fruit.
Just before serving, warm jam with 2 tbs water in a microwave-safe bowl for 30 seconds. Strain and cool for 5 minutes. Drizzle over trifle to serve.
